title: What's That
description: This app let's you take a picture and it says out loud what is in the image. Using the Clarifai API to determine what concepts are in the image and using the react-native-speech npm package to create audio output to describe what is in the image.

title: Beer Tapper
description:
This game is insprired by the arcade game Beer Tapper. The rules are simple.
  1. Serve your customers a beer before they reach the end of the bar.
  2. Donâ€™t over pour.
  3. Collect your empty glasses.

title: Connect Four
description: This game is inspired by the board game Connect Four. To win you must be the first player to get four of your colored checkers connecting in a row either horizontally, vertically or diagonally.
